DOC.brief_summary: In single-dose , randomize , 5-way cross-over study , healthy volunteer treat high approve dose octreotide , three different dos Somatoprim ( DG3173 ) placebo control . The main purpose study investigate effect treatment control plasma glucose well secretion insulin glucagon follow standard meal .
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Pharmacodynamic Pharmacokinetic Study DG3173
